result.execSummary:
Brandon Joseph Creech was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Brandon Joseph Creech was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

09:18 AM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Harris. ADA: Michael Joseph Becker, DF ATTY:  A.W. Schutte, DF:  Brandon Joseph Creech appeared from jail.  Court reviews file.  Court will accept waiver of Extradition.  Defendant wishes to voluntarily waive extradition.  Defendant executes Waiver and court certifies same. S/T from defendant.  Court signs waiver of Extradition.  Cour quashes WA.  Adjourned 9:30 AM. bph  Bail/Bond Hearing scheduled for June 8, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

for Release/ Modification/ Change in Sentence. Bond reduction. Filed by DE. arc       to EFV.

- I understand that I must report to and comply with all terms, conditions, and protocols of the St. Croix County Justice Support Center. I further understand that I am required to be fitted with a GPS monitoring device. Failure to report and/or comply with conditions and/or protocols may result in a report to the District Attorney's Office, an arrest warrant, and/or referral for criminal charges.

I understand that I must IMMEDIATELY report to the Justice Support Center located adjacent to the lower parking lot of the St. Croix County Government Center. 

If after regular business hours I must call (715)245-4109 to schedule an appointment with the Justice Support Center by the end of the following business day.

- Defendant must report to LaPorte County, IN courthouse upon release by next business day during business hours.

11:31 AM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA: Michael Becker, DF ATTY:  A.W. Schutte, DF:  Brandon Joseph Creech appeared from jail. Court reviews file. ADA Becker states that no governor's warrant has been received from Indiana. Atty. Schutte responds. ADA Becker requests additional time. Atty. Schutte requests bond with report to IN date. ADA Becker makes bond argument. Court sets bond.
Status conference on May 6, 2022 at 11:30 am.

02:48 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. ADA: Michael Joseph Becker, DF ATTY: A.W. Schutte, DF: Brandon Joseph Creech appeared from jail. Court reviews case. ADA Becker states have not received warrant yet and the warrant is still at the atty generals office awaiting to be returned. Atty Schutte request to set bond as Atty in IN is working on getting warrant quashed. ADA Becker requests to extend time limits. Court sets STC. Adjourned 02:53 PM  Status conference scheduled for May 6, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on April 26, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

03:18 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. ADA: Michael Joseph Becker, DF ATTY: A.W. Schutte, DF: Brandon Joseph Creech appeared. Court reviews case. ADA Becker has been in contact with Deputy Prosecuter from Laport Co, IN and paperwork would be sent to the atty generals office by the end of the week. ADA Becker requests to extend time periord per offer of proof due to 2 active warrants. Atty Schutte makes argument to set bond. Court questions Atty's. Court reveiws Statues. ADA Becker makes arguement. Atty Schutte makes argument. Court extends time limits until 04/26/22. Court sets STC.  Status conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Status conference on April 11, 2022 at 03:15 pm.

08:45 AM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. ADA: Michael Joseph Becker, DF ATTY: A.W. Schutte, DF: Brandon Joseph Creech appeared from jail. Court reviews case. ADA Becker states there is not a governors warrant at this time, and waiting to hear back from appropriate County in IN. Court addresses Atty's and refers to WI Status. ADA Becker notes Court Services advised IN is in the process of obtaining a governors warrant for DE but is not yet completed. Court makes finding extending time limits until 04/11/22. Court sets STC. Adjourned 09:05 AM.  Status conference scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
Status conference on April 7, 2022 at 08:45 am.

10:13 AM CO: Vlack, DAR: Gross, Clerk: K Kittel.   ADA:   Michael Joseph Becker   DF ATTY:  A.W. Schutte   DF:  Brandon Joseph Creech appeared from jail. Attys Schutte responds as to other out of State / County matters, will not be waiving extradition at this time. Atty Becker notes Atty Schutte has informally withdrawn motion. Resets the matter. Adjourned: 10:17 am.  Status conference scheduled for April 7, 2022 at 08:45 am.
Order for payment on April 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
